translation.en: [Oprah] That's why this book is so important.
translation.zh: 所以这本书才这么重要

translation.en: I called up Gayle. I go, "You need to do what Viola did."
translation.zh: 我给盖尔打电话说： “你得跟维奥拉一样做

translation.en: "You need to get down on your knees." "You need to pray and ask for what you want."
translation.zh: 你得跪下 为你想要的东西祈祷”

translation.en: But also looking for the kind of life he has led before you.
translation.zh: 同时也是在寻找 他在遇到你之前的人生

translation.en: I was in therapy at the time, and I remember my therapist just saying,
translation.zh: 我当时在接受心理治疗 我记得我的治疗师说：

translation.en: "Viola, find someone who loves you."
translation.zh: “维奥拉 找一个人爱你的人

translation.en: "Just find someone who loves you."
translation.zh: 请你找一个爱你的人”

translation.en: And I remember saying that to Julius too.
translation.zh: 我记得对朱利叶斯说过

translation.en: "I'm just looking for someone who'd just lay down their life for me, that loves me."
translation.zh: 我在找一个愿意为我付出生命的 爱我的人

translation.en: He's like, "I love you."
translation.zh: 他说：“我爱你”

translation.en: And I remember we both stopped, and I looked at him, and he looked at me.
translation.zh: 我记得我们都停了下来 我看着他 他看着我

translation.en: -Aw. -[Viola] You know? He was like, "I'm all those things, V. I am."
translation.zh: 你知道 他说：“我就是你想要的人 V 真的”

translation.en: And then we… we made something to eat like we'd usually do. [laughing]
translation.zh: 然后我们像平常一样 做了些吃的

translation.en: You say there are moments in your life that absolutely live up to the hype.
translation.zh: 你说你生命中有一些不负所望的时刻

translation.en: And one of those moments certainly was the adoption of Genesis.
translation.zh: 其中一个时刻 一定是收养珍妮西斯

translation.en: [Oprah] How did it change you as a woman?
translation.zh: 这对身为女人的你产生了哪些影响？

translation.en: In 2011, Viola and her husband, Julius,
translation.zh: 2011年 维奥拉和她的丈夫朱利叶斯

translation.en: adopted a baby girl who was living in foster care
translation.zh: 收养了一个小女孩 她在此前

translation.en: in Viola's home state of Rhode Island.
translation.zh: 住在维奥拉家乡罗德岛州的 一个寄养中心

translation.en: They named her "Genesis."
translation.zh: 他们给她取名珍妮西斯

translation.en: Today Genesis is 11.
translation.zh: 今天珍妮西斯11岁了

translation.en: [Viola] Oh man, Genesis.
translation.zh: 天哪 珍妮西斯

translation.en: You know, to live for something bigger than yourself.
translation.zh: 你知道 为比自己更重要的东西而活

translation.en: I mean, that's what it was.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: The first time she looked at me and squeezed me
translation.zh: 她第一次看着我 抱着我

translation.en: and made me believe that I could be her mom,
translation.zh: 让我相信我可以成为她的妈妈

translation.en: and I could mother her and…
translation.zh: 我可以照顾她…

translation.en: And that, sort of, just really pure love that only children can give you.
translation.zh: 这种纯粹的爱 只有孩子才能给你

translation.en: [Viola] And I'll tell you one thing.
translation.zh: 我告诉你一件事

translation.en: All of the tools you need to raise a little girl,
translation.zh: 扶养一个小女孩所需的一切

translation.en: the affirmations, all those things,
translation.zh: 那些肯定 所有一切

translation.en: while you're doing that, you're healing yourself.
translation.zh: 在你做的时候 你就在治愈自己

translation.en: [Oprah] Yeah. My next question is,
translation.zh: 我的下一个问题是

translation.en: how have you navigated raising a daughter
translation.zh: 你是怎么养育女儿的？

translation.en: when you never got what you needed
translation.zh: 明明在你自己的成长过程中 你没有得到过

translation.en: when you were being raised?
translation.zh: 任何你需要的东西？

translation.en: It's my opportunity to be able to do that.
translation.zh: 这是我好好养育孩子的机会

translation.en: And so does it feel like giving that back to yourself?
translation.zh: 这是否就像给予曾经的自己 应得的东西？

translation.en: -[Viola] Absolutely. -Yes.
translation.zh: -是的 -对

translation.en: Little Viola is always running around.
translation.zh: 小维奥拉总是在四处奔跑

translation.en: You know, sort of guiding me.
translation.zh: 你知道 指引着我

translation.en: Yeah. And also Genesis being very different from who I am
translation.zh: 对 而且珍妮西斯跟我非常不一样

translation.en: is helping me also see myself in a different way.
translation.zh: 她帮助我从另一个角度检视自己

translation.en: [Oprah] You wrote this on social media about your own mother, May Alice.
translation.zh: 你在社交媒体上写到过你的母亲 梅爱丽丝

translation.en: You said, "This is the woman who birthed me, loves me, and would die for me."
translation.zh: “这个女人生育了我 爱我 愿意为我而死

translation.en: "Our bond runs deeper than anything man-made or given."
translation.zh: 我们的感情比任何 人造或赋予的感情都要深

translation.en: "No one can love you like your mama loves you."
translation.zh: 没有人会像你妈妈一样爱你

translation.en: "Not even the love of your life."
translation.zh: 即使是你的一生挚爱”

translation.en: So what did you learn from your own mother
translation.zh: 那么 你从你母亲身上学到了什么

translation.en: that you have now been able to pass on and transfer to Genesis?
translation.zh: 是你可以继续传递给珍妮西斯的？

translation.en: Number one, that I believe my mom did the best she could with what she knew.
translation.zh: 第一 我相信我妈妈在她能力范围内 做到了最好

translation.en: And also,
translation.zh: 而且

translation.en: my mom is very smart.
translation.zh: 我妈妈非常聪明

translation.en: My mom sees people and she sees through people.
translation.zh: 我妈妈能看清别人 她能看到三个人

translation.en: Oh, she could read them, right? She's one who can read them.
translation.zh: 她可以读懂别人

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Oprah] She could read 'em. Yeah.
translation.zh: -对 -对

translation.en: I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 我很感激这一点

translation.en: Yeah. When I talk to you about Ma Rainey's Black Bottom,
translation.zh: 对 我跟你聊 《雷尼大妈的黑臀舞曲》的时候

translation.en: You said, one of the ways you go into examining a character,
translation.zh: 你说过 你研究角色的方式之一

translation.en: one of the many ways,
translation.zh: 你的很多种方式之一

translation.en: is by asking, "What is this character living for?"
translation.zh: 是问：“这个角色为什么而活？”

translation.en: Yeah. [Oprah] So I end our conversation today with,
translation.zh: -对 -我想用这个问题结束今天的对话

translation.en: what are you, Viola Davis, now living for?
translation.zh: 维奥拉戴维斯 如今的你 为什么而活？

translation.en: First of all, I'm living for my peace and my joy.
translation.zh: 首先 我为了我的安宁和快乐而活

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I wanna be happy in my life.
translation.zh: 我想活得快乐

translation.en: And I know happiness is a journey.
translation.zh: 我知道幸福是一段旅程

translation.en: It's not a destination.
translation.zh: 不是目的地

translation.en: I know it's speckled with bad,
translation.zh: 我知道其中会有很多不如意

translation.en: but I wanna feel some level of peace and joy in my life.
translation.zh: 但我想要在人生中 感受到一定程度的安宁和快乐

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: To help people to live better.
translation.zh: 帮助人们过上更好的生活

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: You have done that.
translation.zh: 你做到了

translation.en: In finding yourself, you've helped all of us
translation.zh: 在寻找自己的过程中 你帮到了我们所有人

translation.en: who hear your story, who read your story,
translation.zh: 这些听到你的故事 读到你的故事

translation.en: who see you be the light you are…
translation.zh: 看到你散发出的光明的人

translation.en: -Thank you. -…find a part of ourselves.
translation.zh: 都找到了一部分的自己

translation.en: And I thank you so much.
translation.zh: 我非常感谢你

translation.en: I'm so excited for people to read Finding Me.
translation.zh: 我很期待大家读到《寻找自己》

translation.en: It is astonishing
translation.zh: 你所忍受的东西

translation.en: what you have been able to endure.
translation.zh: 真的非常惊人

translation.en: And for us to see you to come into this other side of yourself,
translation.zh: 让我们看到你剖析自己的另一面

translation.en: makes it possible for us to believe it's possible for ourselves.
translation.zh: 让我们相信 自己也许也能做到

translation.en: So, thank you.
translation.zh: 所以 谢谢你

translation.en: -Thank you, Oprah. [chuckling] -[Oprah] Thank you, Viola.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 奥普拉 谢谢你 维奥拉

translation.en: I just wanna say to you all, Finding Me is available on April 26th,
translation.zh: 我想告诉大家《寻找自己》

translation.en: wherever books are sold.
translation.zh: 将于4月26日发售

translation.en: And the audio book too. [in Viola's voice] Viola in her world-famous Viola voice…
translation.zh: 还有有声书版 维奥拉用她 世界闻名的声音

translation.en: [in normal voice] …reads her own story that you all need to hear.
translation.zh: 读她自己的故事 你们都需要听一听

translation.en: So I hope you'll get a book.
translation.zh: 所以我希望你能买一本

translation.en: And when you get it, buy one for a friend,
translation.zh: 给自己买的同时 也给你朋友买一本

translation.en: 'cause you're gonna want to talk about it with a friend.
translation.zh: 因为你会想和你朋友讨论的

translation.en: That's what I did with Gayle.
translation.zh: 我就给盖尔买了一本

translation.en: I got it, and then Gayle's like, "Well, send me a copy."
translation.zh: 我买了一本 盖尔说：“给我寄一本”

translation.en: So get it, and then get one for a friend.
translation.zh: 买一本 然后给你朋友买一本

translation.en: Yeah. Thank you.
translation.zh: 对 谢谢
